name: Ray Bao
title: Software Developer
bio: Currently working as a Software Developer at Ploomba, building AI-powered agricultural platforms. Previously interned at Microchip Technologies working on spaceflight computing for NASA JPL.

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
experience.description: Developed tools for NASA JPL's spaceflight computing systems.
highlights: Developed a tool using C, Python, Mako templates, and SWIG to generate device configuration binaries for the Microchip PIC64-HPSC (High Performance Spaceflight Computing) MPUs for NASA JPL
Created and maintained Jenkins artifacts for the device configurator, distributing to other teams and coordinating development in an Agile-DevOps environment using JIRA and Bitbucket
Developed firmware code and tests verified on custom software and hardware emulation platforms through a Bitbucket/Jenkins pipeline

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: Building AI-powered agricultural platforms for farmers.
highlights: Contributed to development of an AI-powered agricultural platform supporting farmers through intelligent insights and robotic automation
Designed and implemented robust logging and data management systems interacting with over 10,000 database entries, enabling efficient monitoring, debugging, and system scalability
Utilized Node.js, Mantine, and Yarn to build and maintain application components emphasizing performance

experience.title: Future Tech Intern
experience.description: Automated network topology testing for SR Linux systems.
highlights: Worked as a PHP developer alongside a network architect to automate testing for proof-of-concept network topologies on Nokia SR Linux Network Operating System
Deployed virtual full and half mesh network topologies hosted on DigitalOcean cloud infrastructure using IP networking and routing in containerized SR Linux routers with ContainerLab and Docker
Integrated ContainerLab with PHP to allow proof-of-concept network topologies to be constructed and deployed from a user-friendly web GUI, improving deployment speed by 50%

experience.title: Full Stack Web Developer
experience.description: Co-op position building web applications and payment systems.
highlights: Completed front-end interface design using HTML, JavaScript, and CSS to improve user experience
Integrated MySQL with PHP on an Apache/XAMPP stack and implemented PayPal REST API calls to deliver a functioning subscription service
